title: Arugula Salad With Pesto Vinaigrette
summary: Arugula Salad With Pesto Vinaigrette is a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 recipe with 4 servings. This side dish has 101 calories, 2g of protein, and 8g of fat per serving. For $1.16 per serving, this recipe covers 7% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 3 people were impressed by this recipe. A mixture of wine vinegar, baby arugula, basil pesto, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 65%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Arugula Salad with Parmesan Vinaigrette, Arugula Salad with Caesar Vinaigrette, and Arugula Salad With Raspberry Vinaigrette.
instructions: Arrange the tomato and artichoke hearts over a bed of arugula. Whisk together the vinegar and pesto, drizzle over the salad, and serve.                    Photo: Christopher Hirsheimer          Rate this Recipe and View Reviews

steps.step: Arrange the tomato and artichoke hearts over a bed of arugula.
Whisk together the vinegar and pesto, drizzle over the salad, and serve.
